Summary: huge large mass circular,not outter rim,black pattern filled the circle,it dropped 1 foot then quickly descended downward
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Clarksville
There were no other sightings in Clarksville on or around October 12th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving from my home to lowes down 101 st. Midway from my home to lowes I just happened to look up in front of me to my right was a huge round object patterened in black way above a tree I was passing.It then dropped about a foot. then totally went straight down.I feel weird not scared but maybe its seeing something I wasnt expecting.It was massive in size I seen no outter circle but the pattern was in a circlular shape inside the mass.I know what I seen and any hipnosis or whatever would prove it. since I was driving on a busy street with no pull over lanes I didnt look further but the area was over rocky high land.
